String.string: This will be a big help.
Kill {@LinkCreature:47#1001#Tirkai grizzlies}, {@LinkCreature:47#4001#argonomorph Dagonite crusaders}, and {@LinkCreature:47#2001#argonomorph caprin imps} in the {@Rgn:47002$$Whitefrost Forest}.
See {@Creature:247#1002$$Salaine} at {@Rgn:47006$$Field Base Lunacy} for your reward.
